T02D2114:154b-0: @154b ` // bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2114:154b-1: sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste //
T02D2114:154b-2: gsungs pas gtor ma bshad de /
T02D2114:154b-3: de la rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2114:154b-4: phyi'i gtor ma dang nang gi gtor ma gnyis so //
T02D2114:154b-5: dang po phyi gtor gtang ba /
T02D2114:154b-6: rin po che'i snod du kha zas gtsang ma dang chu gtsang mas bkang la /
T02D2114:154b-11: de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags gsum gyi rting la /
T02D2114:154b-12: nam:sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te /
T02D2114:154b-13: aom sam bha ra sam bha ra h'um /
T02D2114:154b-15: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D2114:154b-16: gtsang rigs kyi mgon po rnams dang /
T02D2114:154b-17: 'gro ba ris drug gi sems can rnams la 'dod
T02D2114:154b-18: pa'i longs spyod char bzhin 'bab par gyur cig ces
T02D2114:154b-19: bsngo'o// nang gi gtor ma ni /
T02D2114:154b-22: kam las thod pa gsum gyi sgyed pu /
T02D2114:154b-23: a'a las thod pa'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du /
T02D2114:154b-26: de la aa las zla ba'i khams rdo rje rtse lnga pa skyug pa cig bsgom mo //
T02D2114:154b-27: de la aom h'um hr'i:zhes brjod pas las kyi rlung
T02D2114:154b-28: bskyod pas bsod nams kyi me sbar bas dam tshig
T02D2114:154b-29: gi bdud rtsi dros ye shes kyi bdud rtsir gyur
T02D2114:154b-30: / las thams cad pa'i sngags kyi mjug la /
T02D2114:154b-31: ga na tsa kra ai dam ba lim /
T02D2114:154b-32: grihna grihna kh'a hi kh'a hi zhes lan gsum gyis
T02D2114:154b-33: bla ma dam pa rnams dang yi dam gyi lha
T02D2114:154b-34: tshogs rnams dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams dang /
T02D2114:155a-0: @155a * // chos skyong ba'i srung ma thugs dam can rnams phyi'i mchod pa /
T02D2114:155a-1: gsang ba'i mchod par bzhes shig / bag chags kyi
T02D2114:155a-2: mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad rgyu dang 'bras bu
T02D2114:155a-3: nas zhi bar mdzad du gsol lo zhes brjod la
T02D2114:155a-4: gtar ma gtang / de nas chos kyi sbyin pa gtang /
